definitions: a respectful form of reference or address to a woman who has a title

examples.text: the car is outside, Your Ladyship

shortDefinitions: respectful form of reference or address to woman who has title

definitions: a form of reference or address to a woman thought to be acting in a pretentious or snobbish way

examples.text: bow everyone, Her Ladyship's actually gracing us with her presence!

shortDefinitions: form of reference or address to woman thought to be acting in grand or self-important way
